PHRASE.LANG: This collection of 4 irresistible moves, for both female and male avatars, are the latest craze: show your love of K-pop by performing these must-have new dances that are as trendy as hilarious: swaying hips with your arms folded, skipping with your hands waving, thrusting while snapping your fingers, and rocking with your chin on your fist. This pack also contains a randomizer, chaining the moves one after the other, for a more varied effect![#Legal]

Cette collection de 4 mouvements irrésistibles, pour hommes et femmes, sont la dernière mode : pour montrer votre amour du style K-pop, performez ces nouvelles danses aussi branchées qu'hilarantes: balancez des hanches les bras croisés, sautillez en agitant les mains, donnez des coups de reins en claquant des doingts, et ondulez avec le menton en appui sur le poing. Cette collection contient aussi un mode aléatoire, qui vous laisse enchainer les passes l'une après l'autre, pour plus de variété! [#Legal]
Diese Sammlung enthvon 4 unwiderstehliche bewegt, sowohl für die Männer und die Frauen, besteht aus: Hula springen, der Denker, Fingern schnippen und gefaltet Armen. [#Legal]
Le risate sono garantite con questa raccolta di quattro gesti per uomini e donne: salto "Hula", il pensatore, schioccare le dita e Braccia conserte. [#Legal]
Las risas están garantizadas con esta colección de cuatro gestos irresistibles a los hombres y mujeres: salto "Hula", el pensador, chasquear los dedos y brazos cruzados.[#Legal]

This collection of 4 irresistible moves, for both female and male avatars, are the latest craze: show your love of K-pop by performing these must-have new dances that are as trendy as hilarious: swaying hips with your arms folded, skipping with your hands waving, thrusting while snapping your fingers, and rocking with your chin on your fist. This pack also contains a randomizer, chaining the moves one after the other, for a more varied effect![#Legal]
